document_data.mainbody:
rightstone Street was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Wrightstone Street was located in the north section of Waterdeeps Sea Ward. It ran east to west, originating on Shield Street and terminating at the junction of the Street of Glances and Staghunters Way. Wrightstone Street was also intersected by Sul Street, Mendever Street, and Ivory Street.
